overview: Established in 2013, Arty Pet is a leading manufacturer of high-quality PET plastic containers in Jordan, specializing in food-grade, pharmaceutical, and industrial packaging solutions with superior transparency and durability.

services.name: Food Grade Containers
services.description: FDA-approved PET containers for food products including spices, coffee, pickles, sauces, dairy, honey, and chocolate

services.name: Pharmaceutical Packaging
services.description: Medical and pharmaceutical grade plastic containers meeting industry standards

services.name: Industrial Packaging
services.description: Containers for chemical products and cleaning supplies with various neck sizes and capacities from 50ml to 5000ml

services.name: Custom Container Design
services.description: Customized container designs to match your brand identity and specific requirements

faqs.q: What types of containers do you manufacture?
faqs.a: We manufacture PET containers ranging from 50ml to 5000ml with various neck sizes, suitable for food, pharmaceutical, and industrial uses.

faqs.q: Do you have food safety certifications?
faqs.a: Yes, we have certification from the Jordan Food and Drug Administration for food-contact products.
Yes, we have developed over 60 molds and can create custom designs to match your brand and specific requirements.

slogan: Quality PET Containers for Every Need

environmentalInitiatives.recycling: Use of raw materials that enable product recycling

qualityStandards: Jordan Food and Drug Administration Certification
